o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:Name: Validate
o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:Comment: On Validate update the Name and Code
o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:HandlerScript:
Function %Validate%(obj, ByRef message) WriteDebug "[mdde_ExampleAttributeValue.Validate] " & obj.UOL Dim objAttribute : Set objAttribute = obj.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_Attribute")
' If the attribute is set, update the Name and Code accordingly. If Not(objAttribute Is Nothing) Then obj.Name = objAttribute.Name obj.Code = objAttribute.Code End If
%Validate% = True End Function
